events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been classified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! I'm Emily from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and need a refund. I'll assist you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
My order number is 87654321, and I have attached a photo of the product I got. Itâ€™s completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order immediately and send you instructions to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund being processed quickly and will follow the return instructions.
The refund has been processed successfully and return shipping details have been emailed to the customer.
Checking in to ensure you received the refund and to ask if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Following confirmation of refund receipt, we are closing this case. Please contact us if you need further help.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
